subject: fix: back button and deep link navigation for join flow
body:
Back buttons on join/create screens used router.back() which fails when
the screen is the entry point (opened via shared link). Deep link handler
also caused double navigation on web since Expo Router already handles
URL routing. Both issues could crash the app or strand users.

- Replace router.back() with router.replace('/home') on all cancel buttons
- Skip initial URL handling on web (Expo Router handles it already)
- Use router.replace() instead of push() in deep link handler
- Add back button to validation loading state on join/[code]
- Show user-friendly error on joinChat race conditions
